description: Orient an object. Orientation is sometimes called a 'ChangeBasis tranformation'. It allows for remapping of geometry from one axis-system to another.

name: Scale

name: Mirror Surface
description: Mirror geometry in a freeform surface.

inputs.name: Frame
inputs.description: Mirror frame (if true, mirror behaviour extends beyond surface edge)

name: Scale NU
description: Scale an object with non-uniform factors.

name: Shear Angle
description: Shear an object based on tilt angles.

description: Camera Obscura (point mirror) transformation.

name: Group
description: Group a set of objects

name: Project
description: Project an object onto a plane.

name: Split
description: Split a compound transformation into fragments.

outputs.name: Fragments
outputs.description: Fragments making up the compound transformation

name: Twist
description: Deforms objects by twisting them around an axis.

inputs.name: Infinite
inputs.description: If true, the deformation is constant throughout the object, even if the axis is shorter than the object.

inputs.name: Rigid
inputs.description: Geometry will not be deformed as it is transformed

name: Rotate 3D
description: Rotate an object around a center point and an axis vector.

name: Mirror Curve
description: Mirror a shape in a freeform curve.

inputs.name: Tangent
inputs.description: Mirror tangent (if true, mirror behaviour extends beyond curve ends)

name: Sporph
description: Deforms an object from a source surface to a target surface

inputs.name: Parameter
inputs.description: U,V parameter on base surface used for orienting.

inputs.name: Parameter
inputs.description: U,V parameter on target surface used for orienting.

inputs.name: Rigid
inputs.description: Geometry will not be deformed as it is transformed

name: Box Array
description: Create a box array of geometry.

inputs.name: X Count
inputs.description: Number of elements in the array x-direction.

inputs.name: Y Count
inputs.description: Number of elements in the array y-direction.

inputs.name: Z Count
inputs.description: Number of elements in the array z-direction.

name: Orient
description: Orient an object. Orientation is sometimes called a 'ChangeBasis tranformation'. It allows for remapping of geometry from one axis-system to another.

name: Ungroup
description: Ungroup a set of objects

name: Mirror
description: Mirror an object.

name: Taper
description: Deforms objects toward or away from an axis

inputs.name: Start
inputs.description: Radius at start of taper axis

inputs.name: End
inputs.description: Radius at end of taper axis

inputs.name: Flat
inputs.description: If true, then a one-directional, one-dimensional taper is created.

inputs.name: Infinite
inputs.description: If true, the deformation happens throughout the geometry, even if the axis is shorter. If false, the deformation takes place only the length of the axis.

inputs.name: Rigid
inputs.description: Geometry will not be deformed as it is transformed

name: Move
description: Translate (move) an object along a vector.

name: Rotate
description: Rotate an object in a plane.

name: Rotate
description: Rotate an object in a plane.

name: Kaleidoscope
description: Apply a kaleidoscope transformation to an object.

name: Rotate Axis [OBSOLETE]
description: This component is obsolete. It has been replaced by another Rotate Axis component

name: Flow
description: Re-aligns objects from a base curve to a target curve.

inputs.name: Reverse Base
inputs.description: If true, then direction of the base curve is reversed.

inputs.name: Reverse Target
inputs.description: If true, then direction of the target curve is reversed.

inputs.name: Stretch
inputs.description: If true, the length of objects along the curve directions is changed to reflect the curve dimensions.

inputs.name: Rigid
inputs.description: Geometry will not be deformed as it is transformed

name: Curve Array
description: Create an array of geometry along a curve.

inputs.name: Count
inputs.description: Number of elements in the array.

name: Compound
description: Compound two transformations.

name: Box Morph
description: Morph an object into a twisted box.

name: Move Away From
description: Translate (move) an object away from another object.

inputs.name: Distance
inputs.description: Distance to move (negative values move towards)

name: Rectangular Array
description: Create a rectangular array of geometry.

inputs.name: X Count
inputs.description: Number of elements in the array x-direction.

inputs.name: Y Count
inputs.description: Number of elements in the array y-direction.

name: Linear Array
description: Create a linear array of geometry.

name: Move
description: Translate (move) an object along a vector.

name: Mirror
description: Mirror an object.

name: Shear Angle
description: Shear an object based on tilt angles.

name: Mirror Curve
description: Mirror a point in a curve.

inputs.name: Tangent
inputs.description: Mirror tangent (if true, mirror behaviour extends beyond curve ends)

name: Map to Surface
description: Map a curve onto a surface via control points.

inputs.name: Source
inputs.description: Base surface for initial coordinate space

name: Polar Array
description: Create a polar array of geometry.

inputs.name: Angle
inputs.description: Sweep angle in radians (counter-clockwise, starting from plane x-axis)

name: Split Group
description: Split a group

name: Splop
description: Wraps geometry onto a surface.

inputs.name: Parameter
inputs.description: U,V parameter on surface used for orienting

inputs.name: Rigid
inputs.description: Geometry will not be deformed as it is transformed
